archimate:Requirement.name: 1EdTech Question & Test Interoperability specification
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The 1EdTech Question & Test Interoperability specification enables the exchange of item and test content and results data between authoring tools, item banks, test construction tools, learning platforms, assessment delivery systems, and scoring/analytics engines.

properties.value: Door vervallen van het Nederlandse profiel NLQTI is de internationale afspraak nu de referentie
